markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Speed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=304)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 585 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 10,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Attacks with a _speed_ weapon are supernaturally swift. While wielding a _speed_ weapon, you gain the quickened condition, but you can use the additional action granted only to make a Strike with the etched weapon.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Speed
